```{r}

  rename(AB_Thoughts="Do you think antibiotic usage can be reduced in your farm by increasing biosecurity/ improved feed/ or vaccination?", Other_feed="What feed do you use for your broiler?/Other specify", Spec_feed="If others, specify...113", Other_KeepHealthy="If others, specify...121", Timesick="When was the last time a chicken/bird was sick?", sick_other="If others, specify...131",
         Sickinterven="If others, specify...138",
Means_of_Decion_ABUSAGE="How does he/she reach at the judgment of advising you to use antibiotics on your farm", 
Respect_the_Treatment_Guidelines_by_AHP="Do you respect/align with the treatment guidelines prescribed by the Animal health practitioners?", 
Barriers_Withdrawal="If No, why is it difficult to consider/apply the withdraw period?", 
Active_in_community="Are you currently involved in a local community/association?",
 Gender_roles_BroilerFarming_Clean=   "Cleaning farmhouse/sheds.", 
 Gender_roles_BroilerFarming_Disp_Manure ="Disposal of manure/wastes",

Testnames<-INIKA_SURVEY %>%
names()

write.csv(INIKAKAP, file = paste("K:/FAG/Tverrfaglig/AMR/FoU-aktiviteter & prosjekter/31218_INIKA_OH_TZ/WP2/TestDUMMIES.csv", sep = ""))



```

```{r}
remove_df<-INIKAKAP%>%
  select(-phonenumber)%>%
  mutate_all(as.character)%>%
 mutate_all(~if_else(is.na(.), "0", "1"))%>%
  mutate_all(as.numeric)%>%
  summarise_all(~sum(.x, na.rm = T))%>%
  t()%>% 
  tibble::as_tibble(rownames = "mycolumns") %>%
  filter(V1 == 0)
```

QUEST_1<-INIKAKAT%>%
  select(-start, -end, -username, -deviceid, -phonenumber, -DateI,-INIKA_OH_TZ_ID)

get_frequencies <- function(df) {
  freq_list <- lapply(df, function(col) {
    freq_table <- as.data.frame(table(col, useNA = "ifany"))
    colnames(freq_table) <- c("Value", "Frequency")
    return(freq_table)
  })
  names(freq_list) <- colnames(df)
  return(freq_list)
}

# Apply the function to the dataset
frequencies <- get_frequencies(QUEST_1)

# Combine the frequencies into a single dataframe
combined_frequenciesQUEST <- bind_rows(
  lapply(names(frequencies), function(colname) {
    freq_table <- frequencies[[colname]]
    freq_table <- mutate(freq_table, Column = colname)
  }),
  .id = "id"
)

write.csv(combined_frequenciesQUEST, file = paste("K:/FAG/Tverrfaglig/AMR/FoU-aktiviteter & prosjekter/31218_INIKA_OH_TZ/WP2/combined_frequenciesQUEST.csv", sep = ""))
